resources.string: ROM-Control application for ROMs made by the Nexus7420-team
The current status of your device:
Enables the boost-abilities of the power-management. This allows the device to reach higher CPU-frequencies and therefore performance, but lowers the battery-lifetime.

Allows the power-management to change various system-configurations when the power-profile is changed. Useful for normal usage, but should be deactivated if the user often customizes the system-settings.
The current powersave-level of the power-management. A higher value indicates a more aggressive power-saving.
Enabled the debug-mode of the power-management. Useful to see if something is wrong in the power-management, e.g. too high battery-drain, slow performance, lags
Enables fingerprint-wakelock so you can unlock the device with the fingerprint-sensor even when the screen is turned off.
